patterns.name: Classic 909 House
patterns.description: Four-on-the-floor house beat with Roland TR-909 drums. Driving kick, crisp claps, and sizzling hi-hats. Pure dancefloor energy.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd*4"),
  s("~ cp"),
  s("[~ hh]*4"),
  s("~ ~ ~ oh")
).bank("RolandTR909")

patterns.name: Full House Track
patterns.description: Complete house arrangement with 909 drums, bass, and chord stabs. Club-ready with all elements layered properly.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd*4, ~ cp, [~ hh]*4").bank("RolandTR909"),
  note("<c2 c2 f2 g2>").sound("sawtooth").lpf(400).gain(.6),
  note("<[~ [c4,e4,g4]] [~ [f4,a4,c5]] [~ [c4,e4,g4]] [~ [g4,b4,d5]]>").sound("sawtooth").lpf(1500).decay(.1).sustain(0).gain(.4)
)

patterns.name: 808 Boom Bap
patterns.description: Boom bap style beat with TR-808 drums. Deep kicks, snappy snares, and shuffled hi-hats. Old school hip-hop vibes.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd [~ bd] ~ bd"),
  s("~ sd ~ [sd ~]"),
  s("hh*8").gain(".5 .3 .6 .3")
).bank("RolandTR808")

patterns.name: Trap Hi-Hats
patterns.description: Modern trap beat with rolling hi-hats and 808 bass. Hard-hitting with rapid hi-hat triplets.

patterns.name: Minimal Techno Loop
patterns.description: Stripped-down minimal techno with subtle variations. Hypnotic repetition with evolving hi-hat patterns.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd*4").gain(.9),
  s("~ [~ hh:3] ~ hh:3").gain(.4).hpf(6000),
  s("~ ~ ~ [cp ~]").gain(.5).room(.4)
).bank("RolandTR909")

patterns.name: Dark Techno
patterns.description: Menacing dark techno with industrial undertones. Pounding kick and metallic textures for warehouse raves.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd*4").gain(1).shape(.4),
  s("~ hh:2 ~ [hh:2 hh:3]").gain(.3).hpf(8000),
  s("~ ~ cp ~").room(.5).gain(.6),
  note("c1").sound("sawtooth").lpf(sine.range(100,400).slow(8)).gain(.5)
).bank("RolandTR909")

patterns.name: Acid Techno
patterns.description: Squelchy acid techno with resonant 303-style bassline. Classic rave sound with filter sweeps.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd*4, ~ cp, hh*8").bank("RolandTR909"),
  note("c2 c2 <eb2 c3> c2 c2 <g2 c2> eb2 c3").sound("sawtooth").lpf(sine.range(200,4000).fast(2)).lpq(15).decay(.08).sustain(0)
)

patterns.name: Drum and Bass Roller
patterns.description: Fast rolling DnB beat with rapid hi-hats and punchy drums. High energy jungle influence.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd ~ [bd bd] ~"),
  s("~ sd ~ [sd sd]"),
  s("hh*16").gain(".3 .2 .4 .2")
).bank("RolandTR909").room(.15)

patterns.name: Liquid DnB
patterns.description: Smooth liquid drum and bass with melodic elements. Atmospheric pads and rolling drums.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd ~ [bd ~] ~, ~ sd ~ sd").bank("RolandTR909"),
  s("hh*16").gain(".2 .1 .3 .1"),
  note("<[c4,e4,g4] [d4,f4,a4] [e4,g4,b4] [c4,e4,a4]>/4").sound("sawtooth").lpf(2000).attack(.1).release(.5).room(.6).gain(.3)
)

patterns.name: Dubstep Wobble
patterns.description: Heavy dubstep wobble bass with LFO modulation. Aggressive and powerful with that signature growl.

patterns.name: Dreamy Ambient Pad
patterns.description: Slow-evolving ambient pad with long attack and release. Creates spacious, floating atmosphere.

patterns.name: Dark Drone
patterns.description: Ominous low drone with subtle movement. Creates tension and unease. Horror or dark ambient.

patterns.name: Generative Ambient
patterns.description: Evolving generative ambient with random elements. Each cycle is unique with subtle variations.

patterns.name: Shimmering Ambient
patterns.description: Bright, shimmering ambient texture with high harmonics. Ethereal and celestial atmosphere.

patterns.name: Jazz Piano Voicings
patterns.description: Sophisticated jazz chord voicings with ii-V-I progression. Rich harmony with electric piano.

patterns.name: Walking Jazz Bass
patterns.description: Walking bass line using acoustic bass sound. Swinging jazz feel with chromatic movement.
patterns.code:
note("<[c2 e2 g2 a2] [d2 f2 a2 b2] [e2 g2 b2 c3] [e2 d2 c2 b1]>")
  .sound("gm_acoustic_bass")
  .room(.3)

patterns.name: Jazz Trio
patterns.description: Full jazz trio with piano, bass, and brushed drums. Classic jazz club atmosphere.
patterns.code:
stack(
  chord("<Dm7 G7 C^7 A7>").dict('ireal').voicing().s("gm_epiano1").room(.4),
  n("<0 3 5 7>").scale("D2:dorian").sound("gm_acoustic_bass"),
  s("~ rim ~ rim, hh*4").bank("RolandTR909").gain(.4)
)

patterns.name: Bebop Lines
patterns.description: Fast bebop-style melodic lines over changes. Complex and virtuosic jazz improvisation feel.

patterns.name: Funky Guitar
patterns.description: Funky muted electric guitar with delay. Classic funk/disco guitar rhythm pattern.

patterns.name: Slap Bass Funk
patterns.description: Slap-style funk bass with syncopated rhythms. Tight and punchy groove.

patterns.name: Full Funk Track
patterns.description: Complete funk arrangement with drums, bass, and guitar. Groove-heavy dancefloor funk.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd ~ bd ~, ~ sd ~ sd, hh*8").bank("RolandTR909"),
  note("c2 ~ c2 eb2 ~ c2 g1 ~").sound("gm_slap_bass_1"),
  note("~ [c4,eb4,g4]*2 ~ [c4,eb4,g4]").sound("gm_electric_guitar_muted").lpf(2000).gain(.4)
)

patterns.name: Disco Strings
patterns.description: Lush disco string arrangement with sweeping lines. Classic 70s disco orchestra sound.

patterns.name: Lo-Fi Chill Beat
patterns.description: Dusty lo-fi hip-hop beat with muted drums and warm filtering. Relaxing study music vibes.

patterns.name: Lo-Fi Piano
patterns.description: Warm lo-fi piano chords with vinyl texture. Nostalgic and cozy atmosphere.

patterns.name: Lo-Fi Full Beat
patterns.description: Complete lo-fi track with drums, bass, and keys. Perfect study/chill background music.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd ~ bd ~, ~ sd:3, hh*4").bank("RolandTR808").gain(".8 .6 .4"),
  note("<c2 a1 f1 g1>").sound("gm_acoustic_bass").lpf(500),
  note("<[c3,e3,g3] [a2,c3,e3] [f2,a2,c3] [g2,b2,d3]>/2").sound("gm_epiano1").lpf(2000).gain(.4)
).lpf(6000).room(.3)

patterns.name: Synthwave Arpeggio
patterns.description: 80s synthwave arpeggios with gated feel. Neon-soaked retro-futuristic vibes.
patterns.code:
note("c4 e4 g4 c5 e5 c5 g4 e4")
  .sound("sawtooth")
  .lpf(2500)
  .decay(.1)
  .sustain(.2)
  .delay(.3)
  .room(.4)

patterns.name: Synthwave Pad
patterns.description: Warm analog-style pad for synthwave. Lush and wide with subtle movement.

patterns.name: Full Synthwave Track
patterns.description: Complete synthwave arrangement with drums, bass, pad, and arp. Pure 80s nostalgia.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd*4, ~ cp, hh*8").bank("RolandTR909").gain(".8 .6 .3"),
  note("<c2 f2 g2 f2>").sound("sawtooth").lpf(400).gain(.5),
  note("<[c3,g3] [f3,c4]>/2").sound("sawtooth").lpf(800).attack(.2).room(.5).gain(.3),
  note("c4 e4 g4 c5 e5 c5 g4 e4").sound("square").lpf(2000).decay(.1).sustain(.1).gain(.25)
)

patterns.name: Trance Arpeggio
patterns.description: Uplifting trance arpeggio with gated synth. Euphoric and energetic classic trance sound.
patterns.code:
note("<c4 e4 g4 b4 c5 b4 g4 e4>*2")
  .sound("sawtooth")
  .lpf(3000)
  .decay(.1)
  .sustain(.1)
  .delay(.25)
  .room(.4)

patterns.name: Trance Lead
patterns.description: Soaring trance lead melody with filter automation. Emotional and anthemic.

patterns.name: Psytrance Bass
patterns.description: Rolling psytrance bassline with 16th note pattern. Driving and hypnotic.

patterns.name: Classic Breakbeat
patterns.description: Chopped breakbeat pattern with funky feel. Old school breaks with shuffle.
patterns.code:
s("bd ~ ~ bd ~ ~ bd ~, ~ ~ sd ~ ~ sd ~ sd, hh*8")
  .bank("RolandTR909")
  .room(.2)

patterns.name: Half-Time Breaks
patterns.description: Heavy half-time breakbeat with big snare. Modern bass music influenced.

patterns.name: Reggae Skank
patterns.description: Classic reggae off-beat rhythm with organ stabs. Laid-back island groove.

patterns.name: Dub Delays
patterns.description: Spacious dub with heavy delay and reverb. Psychedelic echo chamber vibes.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd ~ ~ bd ~ ~ bd ~").bank("RolandTR808"),
  s("~ ~ rim ~").delay(.6).room(.7).gain(.5),
  note("~ c3 ~ ~ ~ eb3 ~ ~").sound("gm_acoustic_bass").delay(.4)
)

patterns.name: Latin Clave
patterns.description: Traditional son clave pattern with Latin percussion. Tropical and danceable.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd ~ ~ bd ~ bd ~ ~"),
  s("~ rim ~ ~ rim ~ ~ rim").gain(.6),
  s("hh*8").gain(.4)
).bank("RolandTR808").room(.2)

patterns.name: Bossa Nova
patterns.description: Gentle bossa nova rhythm with nylon guitar feel. Brazilian jazz sophistication.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd ~ bd ~, ~ rim ~ rim").bank("RolandTR808").gain(.6),
  note("<[c3,e3,g3] [d3,f3,a3] [e3,g3,b3] [d3,f3,a3]>")
    .sound("gm_acoustic_guitar_nylon").room(.4)
)

patterns.name: Afrobeat Polyrhythm
patterns.description: Complex West African-inspired polyrhythm. Multiple interlocking patterns.

patterns.name: Middle Eastern
patterns.description: Middle Eastern scale pattern with exotic feel. Phrygian dominant atmosphere.

patterns.name: Indian Drone
patterns.description: Tanpura-like drone with sustained tones. Meditative Indian classical atmosphere.

patterns.name: Japanese Ritusen
patterns.description: Melodic pattern using Japanese ritusen scale. Serene and contemplative.

patterns.name: Chinese Pentatonic
patterns.description: Pentatonic melody with Eastern character. Ancient and mystical atmosphere.

patterns.name: Chiptune Melody
patterns.description: 8-bit style melody with square wave. Nostalgic video game sound.
patterns.code:
note("c5 e5 g5 e5 c5 g4 c5 e5")
  .sound("square")
  .decay(.1)
  .sustain(0)
  .crush(8)
  .gain(.5)

patterns.name: Chiptune Bass
patterns.description: Chunky 8-bit bass with pulse wave. Classic NES/GameBoy style.
patterns.code:
note("c2 c2 g1 g1 a1 a1 g1 ~")
  .sound("square")
  .crush(6)
  .lpf(1000)
  .decay(.1)
  .sustain(.5)

patterns.name: Chiptune Full Track
patterns.description: Complete 8-bit track with melody, bass, and drums. Pure retro gaming nostalgia.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd sd bd [sd sd]").crush(8),
  note("c5 e5 g5 e5 c5 g4 c5 e5").sound("square").crush(8).gain(.4),
  note("<c2 g1 a1 g1>").sound("square").crush(6).lpf(800).gain(.5)
)

patterns.name: Orchestral Strings
patterns.description: Lush string ensemble with slow chord movement. Cinematic and emotional.

patterns.name: Brass Fanfare
patterns.description: Bold brass fanfare with triumphant feel. Epic and powerful.

patterns.name: Woodwind Ensemble
patterns.description: Gentle woodwind harmonies with pastoral feel. Peaceful and natural.
patterns.code:
stack(
  note("<c4 e4 d4 g4>/2").sound("gm_flute").room(.5),
  note("<e3 g3 f3 b3>/2").sound("gm_clarinet").room(.5).gain(.6)
)

patterns.name: Horror Tension
patterns.description: Unsettling tension builder with dissonant tones. Perfect for suspense and dread.

patterns.name: Horror Stinger
patterns.description: Sharp horror stinger hit. Jump scare impact sound.

patterns.name: Meditation Bells
patterns.description: Gentle bell tones for meditation. Sparse and resonant.

patterns.name: Singing Bowl
patterns.description: Tibetan singing bowl style tones. Deep resonance for mindfulness.

patterns.name: Glitchy Breaks
patterns.description: Choppy glitched-out drums with bitcrushing. IDM/experimental electronic.

patterns.name: Granular Glitch
patterns.description: Granular-style texture with stuttering sounds. Abstract and textural.

patterns.name: Noise Texture
patterns.description: Filtered noise texture for atmosphere. Like wind or static.

patterns.name: Industrial Hits
patterns.description: Heavy industrial percussion with metallic textures. Aggressive and mechanical.

patterns.name: Vocal Synth
patterns.description: Formant filter creating vocal-like sounds. Morphing vowel tones.

patterns.name: Slow Wobble Bass
patterns.description: Deep wobbling bass with slow LFO. Heavy and hypnotic sub.

patterns.name: Reese Bass
patterns.description: Classic reese bass with detuned oscillators. Thick and aggressive.

patterns.name: Warm Analog Pad
patterns.description: Warm, rich pad with subtle movement. Lush and enveloping.

patterns.name: Icy Digital Pad
patterns.description: Cold, crystalline pad with high frequencies. Pristine and ethereal.

patterns.name: Bubbly Arpeggio
patterns.description: Playful bubbling arpeggio pattern. Light and whimsical.
patterns.code:
note("c4 e4 g4 c5 g4 e4 c4 e4")
  .sound("sine")
  .decay(.15)
  .sustain(0)
  .room(.4)
  .delay(.2)

patterns.name: Dark Arpeggio
patterns.description: Minor key arpeggio with ominous feel. Tense and foreboding.
patterns.code:
note("c4 eb4 g4 c5 g4 eb4 c4 g3")
  .sound("sawtooth")
  .lpf(1500)
  .decay(.1)
  .sustain(.1)
  .room(.5)

patterns.name: Electro Stabs
patterns.description: Punchy electro synth stabs. Robotic and futuristic.

patterns.name: Bright Pluck
patterns.description: Bright plucked synth sound. Clean and percussive.

patterns.name: Muted Pluck
patterns.description: Soft muted pluck with low-pass filter. Warm and gentle.

patterns.name: Saw Lead
patterns.description: Classic sawtooth lead with bite. Bold and cutting.

patterns.name: Square Lead
patterns.description: Hollow square wave lead. Retro and distinctive.
patterns.code:
note("c4 e4 g4 e4 c4 g3")
  .sound("square")
  .lpf(1500)
  .decay(.15)
  .sustain(.3)

patterns.name: 3 Against 4
patterns.description: Polyrhythm with 3 against 4 feel. Complex and hypnotic.

patterns.name: 5 Against 4
patterns.description: Polyrhythm with 5 against 4. Unusual and engaging.

patterns.name: Euclidean 7/16
patterns.description: Euclidean rhythm with 7 hits over 16 steps. African-influenced.

patterns.name: Euclidean Layers
patterns.description: Multiple layered Euclidean patterns. Dense and evolving.

patterns.name: Shuffle Beat
patterns.description: Swung shuffle rhythm with triplet feel. Groovy and bouncy.

patterns.name: Basic Rock Beat
patterns.description: Straightforward rock drum pattern. Solid and driving.

patterns.name: Rock with Fill
patterns.description: Rock beat with tom fill variation. Dynamic and powerful.
patterns.code:
s("<[bd sd bd sd] [bd sd bd [mt lt]]>, hh*8")
  .bank("RolandTR909")

patterns.name: Blast Beat
patterns.description: Intense blast beat pattern. Extreme and relentless.

patterns.name: Double Kick Metal
patterns.description: Heavy double kick pattern. Brutal and pummeling.

patterns.name: Waltz Time
patterns.description: 3/4 waltz rhythm pattern. Elegant and flowing.

patterns.name: 6/8 Groove
patterns.description: Compound 6/8 time feel. Rolling and smooth.

patterns.name: 2-Step Garage
patterns.description: UK garage 2-step rhythm. Skippy and shuffled.

patterns.name: Garage Bass
patterns.description: Wobbly UK garage bass. Deep and rolling.

patterns.name: Future Bass Chords
patterns.description: Lush future bass chord stabs. Emotional and modern.

patterns.name: Riddim Dubstep
patterns.description: Minimal riddim dubstep pattern. Trippy and hypnotic.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd ~ ~ ~ bd ~ ~ ~, ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ sd ~ ~").bank("RolandTR909"),
  note("c1 ~ c1 c1 ~ c1 c1 ~").sound("sawtooth").lpf("400 200 600 200").decay(.1).sustain(0)
)

patterns.name: Complextro Layers
patterns.description: Complex layered electronic with changing sounds. Busy and dynamic.
patterns.code:
stack(
  s("bd*4, ~ cp").bank("RolandTR909"),
  note("<c3 g3 c3 [eb3 g3]>").sound("<sawtooth square>").lpf("<1000 2000>").decay(.1).sustain(0)
)

patterns.name: Happy Major
patterns.description: Bright major key melody. Joyful and uplifting.

patterns.name: Sad Minor
patterns.description: Melancholic minor melody. Emotional and introspective.

patterns.name: Diminished Tension
patterns.description: Unstable diminished chord movement. Creates strong tension.

patterns.name: Resolution to Major
patterns.description: Tension resolving to major chord. Satisfying and complete.

patterns.name: Random Scale Melody
patterns.description: Generative melody with random notes in scale. Always different.

patterns.name: Perlin Noise Texture
patterns.description: Smooth evolving texture using Perlin noise. Organic and flowing.

patterns.name: Sine LFO Modulation
patterns.description: Demonstrating sine wave LFO on filter. Classic synth modulation.

patterns.name: Saw LFO on Gain
patterns.description: Sawtooth LFO modulating volume. Creates rhythmic pumping.

patterns.name: Jux Stereo Effect
patterns.description: Using jux for wide stereo effect with reversed pattern.

patterns.name: Off Pattern Echo
patterns.description: Using off function to create echo/delay effect in pattern.

patterns.name: Ply Stutter
patterns.description: Using ply for stutter/repeat effects on drums.

patterns.name: Add Parallel Harmony
patterns.description: Using add to create parallel harmonies from melody.

patterns.name: Tango Accordion
patterns.description: Expressive accordion melody with tango feel. Passionate and dramatic.

patterns.name: Playful Xylophone
patterns.description: Bright xylophone melody with playful character. Happy and light.
patterns.code:
note("c5 e5 g5 e5 c5 g4 e4 g4")
  .sound("gm_xylophone")
  .room(.4)

patterns.name: Jazz Vibraphone
patterns.description: Mellow vibraphone chords with jazz voicing. Smooth and cool.

patterns.name: Gospel Organ
patterns.description: Soulful organ chords with gospel feel. Spiritual and uplifting.

patterns.name: Pastoral Flute
patterns.description: Gentle flute melody with pastoral character. Peaceful and natural.
patterns.code:
note("c5 d5 e5 g5 e5 d5 c5 ~")
  .sound("gm_flute")
  .room(.5)

patterns.name: Trumpet Call
patterns.description: Bold trumpet melody. Triumphant and announcing.
patterns.code:
note("c4 e4 g4 c5 ~ g4 e4 c4")
  .sound("gm_trumpet")
  .room(.4)

patterns.name: Emotional Cello
patterns.description: Deep cello line with emotional weight. Melancholic and rich.

metadata.description: Comprehensive Strudel pattern database for AI music generation
